title: Mystery Plane Tests ‘Loophole’ in Taiwan’s Defenses
sub_head: Military experts say buzzing of remote island is likely first incursion of Taiwanese territorial airspace by noncommercial Chinese aircraft in decades
body:
TAIPEI—A strange rumbling sound filled the cloudy afternoon skies over a remote corner of Taiwanese territory on Saturday, sending residents scurrying outside to see what was happening.
Sophia Liu, a resident of the island of Dongyin, recalled making calls to people she knew and then seeing a text message from a neighbor pop up on her phone: “A small plane flew over our village 10 minutes ago. Could be the Chinese.”
